attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Leeds united have had there punishment and a -15 point start to their current season.
People should now leave the club to get on with the business in hand of getting back to where they belong.

People that continue to wish and support more negative action to this great club are only bitter, and they should accept that we are winning on the pitch and those eleven players that pull on their shirt every week don't control the clubs finances.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
